# Fortaleza TMA/CTA v1.0
# Included airports: SBFZ
# Created by: Khauam#7556 (Discord)
# Questions, suggestions or comments: DM me on Discord

# Notes:
# SBFZ:	Added two not oficial fix in some SIDs (to force right and left-hand turns of the chart)
